subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: General Manager Brian Cashman said the Yankees would re-evaluate Derek Jeter’s injury, a Grade 1 quadriceps strain, after the All-Star break. Jeter was hurt in his first game back from a twice-broken ankle.
snippet: General Manager Brian Cashman said the Yankees would re-evaluate Derek Jeter’s injury, a Grade 1 quadriceps strain, after the All-Star break. Jeter was hurt in his first game back from a twice-broken ankle.
